name: Lǐ Èr Nián Yǒng Chuǎng Héhuān Zōng
summary: A text adventure game in first-person perspective, with the protagonist being male. You need to uncover the truth by having conversations with various cute girls. Trigger different events through options and finally choose the ending that suits you.

name: Lǐ Shì Qírén Yì Wén Lù
summary: A Arknights fan game featuring the original character ‘Old Li’ as the protagonist, set in Lungmen twenty years ago, where a series of mystery-solving and detective stories unfold.
